newsitem.title: JAPAN: Shindengen to issue Euroyen convertible.
newsitem.headline: Shindengen to issue Euroyen convertible.

text.p: BORROWER - Shindengen Electric Manufacturing Co Ltd
LEAD MANAGER - Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank (Deutschland) AG
TYPE Euroyen convertible ISSUE NO AMT 3 bln yen
COUPON nil ISS PRICE PAR MATURITY 18 Sep 2000
CONV FROM 1 Nov 1996 CONV TO 6 Sep 2000
LAST MOODY'S PAY DATE 18 Sep 1996 INT PAY
LAST S&P SIGN DATE 11 Sep 1996 SUB DATE
LAST JCR LAST JBRI LAST NIS
The conversion price will be decided on September 10.
